description.narrative: Government institutional capacity for child- centered, equity-focused, evidence-based and inclusive national development policies and strategies enhanced, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation And Research, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, Ethiopian children benefit from an improved policy environment, and evidence-informed, child-friendly, gender-sensitive and results-oriented planning and financing in support of the inclusive, sustainable and equitable realization of child rights

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government institutional capacity for child- centered, equity-focused, evidence-based and inclusive national development policies and strategies enhanced

description.narrative: The year 2020 was marked by a continuous focus on child poverty measures. UNICEF and the Central Statistical Agency have provided estimates on the overlap between multidimensional and monetary child poverty. The child labour analysis and the support provided to the Young Lives Project resulted in evidence generation on child and youth well-being as they transition into adulthood respectively. Based on the agreement with Policy Studies Institute, a comprehensive assessment of child focused policies in relation to the child policies has started with the ultimate objective to make policies child sensitive and inform for the improvement of policy implementation. | Status:Met | As-of Date:30/06/2020

title.narrative: Number of researches, evaluations and situation analysis published for advocacy and policy dialogue

title.narrative: Implementation rate of management responses to evaluation
Monetary and multidimensional child poverty is routinely measured and reported by the government
